help.explain_text: Writes some useful tips on getting started to the console output.

commandlist.explain_text: Lists all commands in the database.

explain.explain_text: Takes one command as an argument and returns the explain text for that command.

clearall.explain_text: Erases both command history and console output.

newline.explain_text: Logs an empty line to the console.

forcequit.explain_text: Closes the game directly through the SceneTree.
